00039 //---------------------------------------------------------
00040 //   MeasureWidth
00041 //    return value for layoutX()
00042 //---------------------------------------------------------
00043 
00044 struct MeasureWidth {
00045       double stretchable;
00046       double nonStretchable;
00047 
00048       MeasureWidth() {}
00049       MeasureWidth(double a, double b) {
00050             stretchable = a;
00051             nonStretchable = b;
00052             }
00053       };

00055 //---------------------------------------------------------

00057 //    per staff values of measure

00059 
00060 struct MStaff {
00061       Bar* endBar;
00062       double distance;
00063       double userDistance;
00064 
00065       MStaff() {
00066             endBar = 0;
00067             }
00068       };
00069 
00070 typedef std::vector<MStaff> MStaffList;
00071 typedef MStaffList::iterator iMStaff;
00072 typedef MStaffList::const_iterator ciMStaff;

00074 //---------------------------------------------------------
00075 //   Measure
00076 //    one measure in a system
00077 //---------------------------------------------------------
00078 
00079 class Measure : public Element {
00080       Segment* _first;        // segment list
00081       Segment* _last;
00082       int _size;              // number of segments
00083 
00084       MStaffList  staves;
00085       BeamList    _beamList;
00086       TupletList  _tupletList;
00087       ElementList _pel;       // page relative elements (text)
00088       ElementList _sel;       // measure(/tick) relative elements
00089 
00090       int        _no;         // measure number, counting from zero
00091       int        _noOffset;   // offset to measure number
00092       SText*     _noText;     // measure number text object
00093 
00094       double _userStretch;
00095       bool _lineBreak;        // forced line break
00096       bool _pageBreak;        // forced page break;
00097       bool _irregular;        // irregular measure, do not count
00098 
00099       void push_back(Segment* e);
00100       void push_front(Segment* e);
00101 
00102    public:
00103       Measure(Score*);
00104       ~Measure();
00105       Measure(const Measure&);
00106       virtual Measure* clone() const { return new Measure(*this); }
00107       virtual void draw(Painter&) const;
00108       virtual void read(QDomNode, int idx);
00109       virtual void write(Xml&, int, int) const;
00110       virtual bool startDrag(const QPointF&) { return true; }
00111       virtual void add(Element*);
00112       virtual void remove(Element*);
00113 
00114       MStaffList* staffList()          { return &staves;      }
00115       BeamList*   beamList()           { return &_beamList;   }
00116       TupletList* tupletList()         { return &_tupletList; }
00117 
00118       ElementList* pel()               { return &_pel;        }
00119       const ElementList* pel() const   { return &_pel;        }
00120 
00121       int    no() const                { return _no;          }
00122       bool   irregular() const         { return _irregular;   }
00123       void   setIrregular(bool val)    { _irregular = val;    }
00124       int    noOffset() const          { return _noOffset;    }
00125       SText* noText() const            { return _noText;      }
00126       void   setNoText(const QString& s);
00127       void   setNo(int n)              { _no = n;             }
00128       void   setNoOffset(int n)        { _noOffset = n;       }
00129       double distance(int i) const     { return staves[i].distance; }
00130       double userDistance(int i) const { return staves[i].userDistance; }
00131 
00132       int size() const            { return _size;       }
00133       virtual int tickLen() const;
00134       void moveAll(double, double);
00135       Segment* first() const      { return _first;      }
00136       Segment* last() const       { return _last;       }
00137       void remove(Segment*);
00138       bool empty()                { return _first == 0; }
00139 
00140       double userStretch() const  { return _userStretch; }
00141       bool lineBreak() const      { return _lineBreak; }
00142       bool pageBreak() const      { return _pageBreak; }
00143       void setUserStretch(double v)  { _userStretch = v;  }
00144       void setLineBreak(bool v)   { _lineBreak = v;    }
00145       void setPageBreak(bool v)   { _pageBreak = v;    }
00146 
00147       void addBeam(Beam* b);
00148       void addTuplet(Tuplet* b);
00149 
00150       System* system() const        { return (System*)parent(); }
00151       void setSystem(System* s)     { setParent((Element*)s);   }
00152 
00153       ElementList* el()             { return &_sel; }
00154       const ElementList* el() const { return &_sel; }
00155       Bar* bar(int staff) const     { return staves[staff].endBar;   }
00156

00158       void layout(double width);
00159       void moveY(int, double);

00165       int snapNote(int tick, const QPointF p, int staff) const;
